hdr-gdi_group.def: Ratio of female to male HDI values. See Technical note 3 at http://hdr.undp.org/sites/default/files/hdr2020_technical_notes.pdf for details on how the Gender Development Index is calculated.
hdr-gdi_group.name: GDI Group
hdr-gdi_group.source: HDRO calculations based on data from Barro and Lee (2018), IMF (2022), UNDESA (2022a), UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2022), United Nations Statistics Division (2022) and World Bank (2022). IMF (2022), UNDESA (2022b), United Nations Statistics Division (2022) and World Bank (2022).
